results.title: The AT-1 Angiotensin Receptor is Involved in the Autonomic and Neuroendocrine Responses to Acute Restraint Stress in Male Rats.
results.text_hl: The doses of 0.1 and 0.3 mg/kg also reduced the RS-evoked @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@, while in the dose of 1 mg/kg of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ potentiated the tachycardic one.

citations.NLM: Brasil TFS, Belém-Filho IJA, Fortaleza EAT, Antunes-Rodrigues J, Corrêa FMA. The AT-1 Angiotensin Receptor is Involved in the Autonomic and Neuroendocrine Responses to Acute Restraint Stress in Male Rats. Cell Mol Neurobiol. 2022 Jan;42(1):109-124. PMID: 33864194
citations.BibTeX: @article{33864194, title={The AT-1 Angiotensin Receptor is Involved in the Autonomic and Neuroendocrine Responses to Acute Restraint Stress in Male Rats.}, author={Brasil TFS and Belém-Filho IJA and Fortaleza EAT and Antunes-Rodrigues J and Corrêa FMA}, journal={Cell Mol Neurobiol}, volume={42}, number={1}, pages={109-124}}

results.title: Iatrogenic Hypotension Induced by the Improper Treatment of Normal Grief
results.text_hl: After developing symptoms of @DISEASE_Chest_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@chest pain@@@, intermittent @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@, and widespread @DISEASE_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D010146 @@@pain@@@ when he would think of his children in the weeks following their loss, he was prescribed @CHEMICAL_Gabapentin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077206 @@@gabapentin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@ by a general practice nurse.

citations.NLM: Robinson KE. Iatrogenic Hypotension Induced by the Improper Treatment of Normal Grief Case Rep Psychiatry. 2021;2021():6661943. PMID: 33936830
citations.BibTeX: @article{33936830, title={Iatrogenic Hypotension Induced by the Improper Treatment of Normal Grief}, author={Robinson KE}, journal={Case Rep Psychiatry}, volume={2021}, pages={6661943}}

results.title: Regional haemodynamic effects of captopril, enalaprilat and lisinopril in conscious water-replete and water-deprived Brattleboro rats.
results.text_hl: There were small @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardias@@@ and only slight @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@falls in mean blood pressure@@@. 4.

citations.NLM: Muller AF, Gardiner SM, Compton AM, Bennett T. Regional haemodynamic effects of captopril, enalaprilat and lisinopril in conscious water-replete and water-deprived Brattleboro rats. Clin Sci (Lond). 1990 Oct;79(4):393-401. PMID: 2171862
citations.BibTeX: @article{2171862, title={Regional haemodynamic effects of captopril, enalaprilat and lisinopril in conscious water-replete and water-deprived Brattleboro rats.}, author={Muller AF and Gardiner SM and Compton AM and Bennett T}, journal={Clin Sci (Lond)}, volume={79}, number={4}, pages={393-401}}
